lyrics: ayi girinandini nandita medini vishvavinodini nandinute
bhagavati he shitikantha kutumbini bhurikutumbini bhurikrte
jaya jaya he mahishasura mardini ramyakapardini shailasute
jay jay he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
ayi jagadamba madamba kadamba vanapriyavasini hasarate
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
ayee shatakhanda vikhanda tarunda vitundita shunda gajadhipate
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
jay jay he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailsute
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
ayi nijahunkriti matra nirakrita dhumravilochana dhumrashate
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
jaya jaya he mahiṣāsuramardini ramyakapardini śailasute
krut kukuthah kukutho gadadadikatal kutuhal ganarate
dhudhukut dhukkut dhindhimit dhvani dheer mridang ninadarate
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
jaya jaya japya jayejayashabda parastuti tatparavishvanute
natita natardh nati nat nayak natitanatya sugarnate
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
jay jay he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
jay jay he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
jaya jaya he mahiṣāsuramardini ramyakapardini śailasute
jay jay he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
ayi kamale kamalanilaye kamalanilayah sa kathm na bhavet
tava padamev parampadamityanushilayato mam kin na shive
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
tava charanam sharanam karvani natamaravani nivasi shivam
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
tava vimalendukulam vadanendumalam sakalam nanu koolayate
mama tu matam shivanamadhane bhavati kripaya kimut kriyate
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
ayi mayi deen dayalutaya kripayiva tvaya bhavitavyamume
ayi jagato janani kripayasi yathasi thanumitasirate
jaya jaya he mahishasuramardini ramyakapardini shailasute
